column2: oh man. We went here on a Friday night around 6 or 6:30pm after Haymarket proved to be PACKED. The wait wasn't unreasonable for three people
column3: but we were somewhat crunched for time
column4: so we chose to be seated at the communal table within minutes. They had some weird grapefruit soda/beer mix
column6: and that was delicious and I wish I knew about it in the summertime. Â The decor of the restaurant is very nice
column7: and though it was quite loud and somewhat hard to hear what my dinner partners were saying. The bathroom vents/fans/whatever are loud and bass-y
